columnGroups.title: Column Sorting Properties
columnGroups.description: Tweak sorting behavior on individual columns.

items.name: sortDescFirst
items.description: Start in descending order on the first sort toggle (great for numbers).

items.name: sortingFn
items.description: Custom compare function or one of TanStack's built-in identifiers (e.g. 'alphanumeric').

tableGroups.title: DataTable Sorting Props
tableGroups.description: Global props that control sorting at the table level.

items.name: enableSorting
items.description: Enable sorting globally for the table.

items.name: sortingMode
items.description: Choose between client-side or server-side sorting.

items.name: initialState.sorting
items.description: Initial sort order applied on mount (array of { id, desc }).
